Jargon Term: You will also need further evaluation of your anemia as an outpatient.
Please take the antibiotic levofloxacin for the next 6 days. It is important that you take all of it, even if you are feeling better, to get over your pneumonia.
You were also given a prescription for an inhaler to help with shortness of breath and wheezing.
You were also given a prescription for Zolpidem to help you sleep at night.
Please do not drive if you take this medication.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Please follow-up with the providers outlined below.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: Please call your physician or return to the hospital if you develop fevers, worsening shortness of breath, worsening cough, chest pain, or orther concerning symptoms.
